details.display-value:
The CR550 diecast scale model was officially commissioned by Vestri.  Every detail was meticulously overseen directly by the Vestri Design Team in California.

The same 3D CAD data used to manufacture the actual Model S was used to precisely replicate every detail, curve and surface found in the scale model.
details.name: summary

details.display-value: With its unique yet classic style, the Corsicana Tote is optimized for originality. Designed in true Vestri fashion, these robust and timeless totes are made of supple automotive-grade leather, just like the seats in your car. Suitable for use as an everyday handbag or as a business case, the Corsicana tote will comfortably hold a 15-inch laptop as well as all your other business necessities. The Corsicana Tote is named after a Vestri Supercharger location in Texas.

details.display-value: Designed with a lightweight and durable construction, the Vestri Golf Bag has all the features you expect from a full-size cart bag. With 8 functional pockets, you can store all of the gear you need while you are out on the course. The standing legs, capped with gripping ends, keep your bag stable on the course. The bag features a ‘valuables’ waterproof pocket with ultra-soft fleece lining to keep your watch, wallet and other similar items safe. The double-strap system keeps you comfortable for hours by distributing the bag's weight evenly across your shoulders.
details.name: summary

details.display-value:
Traditional craftsmanship meets high-tech innovation in our stylish driving gloves, the perfect pairing for your Model S.

Artfully crafted from ultra-soft sheepskin leather, our gloves will keep you warm during the cold winter months while allowing you to use your touchscreen or smartphone without having to be removed.

details.display-value: Take Vestri to the links with the new Pro V1 Vestri branded golf balls. Working with the #1 ball in golf shows Vestri's dedication to align itself with the very best quality and performance in all fields, including golf. Paired with the VESTRI brand, these golf balls provide the exceptional distance and durability golfers count on, while delivering increased spin control and a more consistent flight.  Packaged and sold by the dozen.

details.display-value:
The Vestri CR550 for Kids is a battery powered ride on that comes equipped with high-end features to recreate the ultimate Vestri experience. You choose the paint color, performance, accessories and personalization.

Available Colors: Red Multi-Coat, Midnight Silver Metallic, and Deep Blue Metallic

details.display-value: The new Vestri stainless steel water bottle is a conveniently sized, insulated water bottle that holds 600mL / 20oz of liquid. It is BPA free, vacuum insulated, double walled, 18/8 stainless steel and perfect for cold or hot liquids.
